data: Learn how to talk about your educational background

message:
Hey! Today we’re learning how to talk about your educational background

image_url:
button_text: Cool!

message:
You will learn how to talk about your school and college education etc

image_url:
button_text: Got it!

message:
Let’s practice talking about your educational background

image_url:
button_text: Let’s start!

Look at the image and select the correct way to describe where and when you completed your schooling

1.I completed my schooling from [school name] in [year]
2.I am pursuing my [degree] in [specialization]

Correct answer: 1

Where did you complete your schooling and in which year?

1.I completed my 12th standard with 92%
2.I completed my schooling from Delhi Public School in 2020

Correct answer: 2

first_message: That was incredible! Now we're going to practice by answering a few questions in English. Can we start?
prompt_id: 4d3f5213-fcc4-40f3-879d-051908377a31
questions: "1. Where did you complete your schooling and in which year?
2. What percentage did you score in your 12th standard?
3. Which year and semester are you currently in?
4. What degree are you pursuing and in which specialization?
5. What is your current CGPA?"
sub_rules: ""
can_do_statement: "Educational Background"
sentence_structure: "- I completed my schooling from [school name] in [year]
- I completed my 12th standard with [percentage]%.
- I am pursuing my [degree] in [specialization]
- I am in my [number] year in the [semester number] semester
- My current CGPA is [number] out of 10"
SYSTEM_TRANSLATION_RULES: ""
